name: Reed The Robotanist Plus
description:
In a world ravaged by a megaconglomerate Oil company, Reed Shoots sure is sick of them being all evil and stuff, its time to take a stand!
Armed with a G.U.N. recoil blasting device, and a pair of Rocket B.O.O.T.S, Reed must hover, jump and launch through countless challenging and fast-paced levels to take down the CEO, Johnathan Oil
Its a tough road ahead, and your friends will only get you so far, so turn up the music, grab your G.U.N., and get to work!

Features:

-Countless Kickass Levels! - Including new collectibles and Bonus levels created just for the Plus Edition!
-A fresh 19 song soundtrack
-A rich and engaging storyline - Revamped just for the Plus Edition!
-A giant freakin' fracking machine mecha!
